name: Eden: Tomorrow
description:
Experience a fantastic journey through an unknown world and survive an odyssey to redefine tension and mystery.
The protagonists of Eden-Tomorrow are a duo of amnesia-stricken humans and a drone called 'Newton'. Both playable and equipped with different powers and abilities.
Your only chance to survive on this alien and hostile planet is teamwork.
Over the course of the game, you get more and more clues about what could have happened to humans, Newton and this world.
developers: Frank Sennholz trading as Soul Pix
